title: WS play.ws.ssl.loose.disableHostnameVerification=true doesn't work?
body:
I have set `play.ws.ssl.loose.disableHostnameVerification=true` and then call a web service on localhost that is known to return a certificate for not-localhost (See [this async-http-client issue](https://github.com/AsyncHttpClient/async-http-client/issues/927) for the details), but the call still fails as per the log extract below. 

Windows 8, Play 2.4.1, Scala 2.11.7, Java 8.0_45.
